q:
In Machine Learning, you are working on the logistic regression modeling process and you want to use the gradient descent algorithm to minimize the cost function of logistic regression. Which of the following functions will you select in this scenario:

  1. repeat {\(\theta \lower 2pt{j}:= \theta \lower 2pt{j} - \alpha \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)})\)} 
  2. repeat {\(\theta \lower 2pt{j}:= \theta \lower 2pt{j} -\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)}).x\lower 2pt{j} ^ {(i)}\)}
  3. repeat {\(\theta \lower 2pt{j}:= \theta \lower 2pt{j} - \alpha \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)}).x\lower 2pt{j} ^ {(i)}\)}
  4. repeat {\(\theta \lower 2pt{j}:= \theta \lower 2pt{j} - \alpha \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)}).h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x\lower 2pt{j} ^ {(i)})\)}

In Machine Learning, which of the following is the cost function for using logistic regression modeling:

1. \({-1 \over m} [ \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m} y^{(i)} log(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)})) + (y^{(i)})log(1-h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}))]\)

2. \({-1 \over m} [ \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m} y^{(i)} log(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)})) + (1-y^{(i)})log(1-h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}))]\)

3. \({-1 \over m} [ \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m} y^{(i)} log(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)})) + (1-y^{(i)})log(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}))]\)

4. \({-1 \over m} [ \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m} log(h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)})) + (1-y^{(i)})log(1-h\lower 2pt{\theta}(x^{(i)}))]\)
